page.title: 16BMX
page.content: The BMX is one of the strongest bikes. It is used for racing on dirt tracks. There are all sorts of BMXs.It is one of the most popular bikes. You can get aero frames on the PK Ripper and on some more bikes.You can get different sorts of brakes,there are two finger brakes and long brakes. On my bike there are long nuts to stand on they are called stunt nuts.The BMX tyres have good grips for when you are on a dirt track.They have different names like butterfly and snake belly. The BMX always has pads so if you fall you dont hurt yourself.If you are racing you need protective clothing and you have a helmet to protect your head.
